CustomField.inlineHelpText: Describe the child's adjustment to foster home, foster parents, and other persons in the home. N/A- Child is not of school age NOTE: For Section (3). (b) and/or (c). If the child may be educationally handicapped and is not receiving special educational services, the local educational agency must be notified promptly - in writing - to request a screening for these services.
CustomField.label: Describe child's adjustment to foster
